Name: ImageReference
SummaryComment: Azure Virtual Machine image. To get the list of all Azure Marketplace image references verified by Azure Batch, see <see cref="PoolOperations.ListNodeAgentSkus"/> and <see cref="NodeAgentSku.VerifiedImageReferences"/>.

Key.Name: Offer
Key.SummaryComment: The offer type of the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image.

Key.Name: Publisher
Key.SummaryComment: The publisher of the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image.

Key.Name: Sku
Key.SummaryComment: The SKU of the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image.

Key.Name: Version
Key.SummaryComment: The version of the Azure Virtual Machines Marketplace image.
Key.RemarksComment: If this property is not specified, it defaults to 'latest', which is the latest version of the image.

Key.Name: VirtualMachineImageId
Key.SummaryComment: The ARM resource identifier of the virtual machine image. Computes nodes of the pool will be created using this custom image. This is of the form /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroup}/providers/Microsoft.Compute/images/{imageName}
Key.RemarksComment: This property is mutually exclusive with other ImageReference properties. The virtual machine image must be in the same region and subscription as the Azure Batch account. For information about the firewall settings for the Batch node agent to communicate with Batch service see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/batch/batch-api-basics#virtual-network-vnet-and-firewall-configuration.
